Listado de Aportantes

Aportante Borrado Aportantente

  • {{name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-lista', templateUrl: './lista.component.html', styleUrls: ['./lista.component.css'] }) export class ListaComponent { public heroNames: string[] =['Persona Natural', 'Candidato', 'Organización Politica']; removeLastHero(): void { const deleteHero = this.heroNames.pop(); console.log({deleteHero}) } }
